h2_title: Jiao-Loong of Waves Boss Fight and Guides
img_above_text:
# Jiao-Loong of Waves
Jiao-Loong of Waves is one of the optional Yaoguai Chiefs you can fight in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). This water-based dragon is a fan of quick moves and tail whips to try and catch you off guard.
## Jiao-Loong of Waves Boss Fight and Guides

img_summary: The image depicts a dramatic scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," specifically the boss fight against Jiao-Loong of Waves, a formidable water-based dragon. The dragon is shown towering over the player character, poised to attack with its quick moves and tail whips. This visual serves as a guide and illustration for players navigating the challenging encounter with this optional Yaoguai Chief in Chapter 6.
